import React from 'react' import ProfileFollowers from './Followers' import ProfileFollowing from './Followers' const ProfileData = ({props}) => { const profile = props return (

{profile.name}

{profile.location}

Followers: {profile.followers.length}

Following: {profile.following.length}

{profile.about}

{profile.work}

) } export default ProfileData;
